title: How much do you like Linkin Park? - Quora

response.answer_text: The band Linkin park, its songs are my companions. Every song defines my condition in some or the other situation. I cannot put into words how much I love it. Just that, if you see me somewhere, whichever mood I am in and if I am humming a song, it has to be of Linkin park. Btw, the picture above is actually my phone wallpaper!!

I have been an ardent listener of Linkin Park since I was 13. This band literally intoduced me to the rock music. Before Linkin Park, I really had no idea what a rock band was. The first song I listened to was “Numb” and I was immediately mesmerized by Chester's voice. I remember listening to that song throughout the day without getting bored and the very same day I bought Hybrid Theory, Meteora and Minutes To Midnight from the music store. Minutes To Midnight was released that same year. Chester's voice was LP's greatest asset and I miss him terribly but he is a legend and legends never die.
